welcomeDescription1: This is a website to count the days you and your loved one have been together. It helps you celebrate your relationship milestones and cherish the moments you've shared. Whether it's been a few days, months, or years, Infinity Love is here to help you keep track of your journey together.
welcomeDescription2: Infinity Love is more than just a date counter. It's a celebration of your unique love story. With its beautiful design and user-friendly interface, you can easily track and share your relationship milestones with your partner.
enterDate: Enter the date you start the relationship
